title: The Triumphant Week of Kevin Simmons, Heroic Consultant
summary: Kevin Simmons, a 58-year-old consultant, discovers his superpower of instilling knowledge instantly. Over a week, he helps his community overcome various challenges using his new ability.
summaryGerman: Kevin Simmons, ein 58-jähriger Berater, entdeckt seine Superkraft, Wissen sofort zu vermitteln. Über eine Woche hinweg hilft er seiner Gemeinschaft, mithilfe seiner neuen Fähigkeit verschiedene Herausforderungen zu bewältigen.
summaryDutch: Kevin Simmons, een 58-jarige consultant, ontdekt zijn superkracht om direct kennis over te brengen. Gedurende een week helpt hij zijn gemeenschap verschillende uitdagingen te overwinnen met zijn nieuwe vaardigheid.
summaryFrench: Kevin Simmons, un consultant de 58 ans, découvre son superpouvoir d'instiller instantanément le savoir. Pendant une semaine, il aide sa communauté à surmonter divers défis grâce à sa nouvelle capacité.

story.text: Kevin discovers he can instantly impart knowledge to others. Intrigued, he begins testing his powers.
Emboldened, Kevin helps a local school struggling with their curriculum. The students quickly excel.
News spreads, and Kevin advises a small business on growth strategies, leading to record profits.
The local hospital seeks Kevin's help for medical staff training, improving patient care markedly.
Kevin grows tired but pushes on, tutoring in a problematic youth program, seeing first signs of progress.
His efforts begin to transform the community. Kevin feels a deep connection and satisfaction with his work.
Reflecting on his week, Kevin is content knowing he has made a real difference. He vows to continue his mission.

ending: And so, Kevin Simmons became not just a consultant, but a true hero to his city.
moral: The greatest power one can possess is the ability to empower others.
